comment.author: 55198937@N05
comment._content: The Magdalene Vinnen (II), launched in 1926, a four masted German steel barque of 3500 tonnes (empty) and 117metres, (the largest operating sailing ship), became the Commodore Johnsen in 1936, was a war reparation to Russia in 1945 and renamed Sedov in 1948. Still operating as a Russian sea cadet training ship. See more here: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sedov

comment.author: 33147718@N05
